divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my way to publix with my mom and dad, when all of a sudden 4 bright white lights aligned across the front of the first ufo and i turned in the direction it was going and looked up and u could see a triangle and it was completely silent. no blinking lights, all lights were solid. and it was hovering fast across until you couldnt see it anymore, and when i got to publix and parked and i look in the direction it came from and there was another one, same exact thing hovering at the same speed and silent. same color lights. it went in the same direction the other one went. i was shaking when i saw it. u could easily tell it wasnt a plane, because unlike a plane it didnt make noise, didnt have any blinking lights. only solid bright lights. and they were flying low enough to tell it was not because of the atmosphere.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Lawrenceville
There were no other sightings in Lawrenceville on or around July 9th 2010
